error$.message: An error has occured. Please retry.

mihoyoError$.message: Unable to connect to Genshin server.

dialog.title: Your link has expired
dialog.message: ⚠ The authentication link is not valid. Please update it. How?

1.title: Informations
1.description: To get your wishes we need an authentication link from the game. This link only allow us to fetch data from the wishes history. We will never have access to your Genshin Impact account. The authentication link is only available from the Windows game client.

2.title: Get your link
2.description: 1. On Windows, open your game and log into your account 2. Press ESC to display Paimon's menu 3. Click on the last entry named Feedback 4. In the opened browser window, copy the link from the address bar

3.title: Link your account to Genshin Wishes

4.title: Well done {{ username }} 👏
4.description: You will need to repeat these steps on each day you want to synchronize your wishes.

cookie.title: Hey! Paimon left us some cookies. 😋
cookie.message: By using this site, you agree to the use of  cookies for traffic analysis only.

welcome.title: Welcome on Genshin Wishes.
welcome.description: This tool will help you to track your characters and weapons wishes on Genshin Impact.

elements.pity: Compute your pity on each banner
elements.archive: Archive your wishes more than one month

deleteAccount.title: Delete your account
deleteAccount.subTitle: Delete all your data on genshin wishes

deleteAccount.label: Type here

deleteAccountConfirm.title: Are you sure that you want to delete your account?

wishes.label: Wishes

noWishes.title: No wish found for this banner
noWishes.message: You can still play with Amber 😅

noResult.title: Wow! There is nothing like this!

wishes.itemNotFound: Item not found, we will update our database as soon as possible!

Any deletion is irreversible.

What do you want to do?

noData$.title: Sorry, no new wishes found
